topic.title: Connect the TA Gateway
topic.shortdesc: Follow the following steps to connect Yeastar TA400/800 FXS VoIP gateway.

section.title: 1. Connect TA gateway to the Internet
section.p: Connect one end of a network cable to the LAN port of the gateway; connect the other end to any port of company’s LAN switch or router.

section.title: 2. Connect your phone
section.p: Connect one end of a RJ11 phone cable to FXS port of TA gateway; connect the other end to your analog phone.

section.title: 3. Power on TA gateway
section.p: Connect the power adapter to the gateway’s power port; plug the power adapter into an electrical outlet.
When the Power LED is on and the RUN LED blinks, the system is running.
